about.title: About Us - Global Shopping Assistant
about.subtitle: We are a team of experts dedicated to providing reliable, fast and safe international shopping services from Japan, Korea and USA.
about.missionDesc1: At Global Shopping Assistant, we have a mission to connect Vietnamese customers with high-quality products from Japan, Korea and USA.
about.missionDesc2: We believe that everyone deserves the right to access the world's best products without being hindered by geographical distance.
about.reliabilityDesc: We put reputation as the top value in every transaction.
about.qualityDesc: We are committed to bringing authentic, highest quality products.
about.dedicationDesc: We always listen and respond to each customer's individual needs.
about.efficiencyDesc: We measure success by customers' real satisfaction.
about.storyDesc1: We started with the desire to make international shopping simpler and easier for Vietnamese people. After successfully building a reliable partner network, we spent the first two years perfecting the system.
about.storyDesc2: Our goal is to turn the complex procedures in international shopping into simple, easy-to-understand steps. During this time we have served thousands of customers - a way for us to ensure that the service really meets real needs.
about.storyDesc3: In 2023, we felt we had reached a level that allowed us to start working on a large scale. Since then, we have focused on shopping services because of the great potential of the cross-border e-commerce market from leading countries.
about.teamDesc: Our diverse team combines expertise in international trade, logistics, information technology and customer service to deliver comprehensive solutions.
